response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and potential impact on your business, I am offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value of $1,200,000, and I am confident it will provide you with an excellent return on investment. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to collaborate with you.", "product_price": 950000}
